--- alter_table_add_foreign_key.sql
alter table foo add foreign key (bar) references t2 (t2key1)

--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 12,
    NameEnd: 15,
    Name:    "foo",
  },
  TableAlternation: &ast.AddTableConstraint{
    Add:             16,
    TableConstraint: &ast.TableConstraint{
      ConstraintPos: 0,
      Name:          (*ast.Ident)(nil),
      Constraint:    &ast.ForeignKey{
        Foreign:     20,
        Rparen:      60,
        OnDeleteEnd: -1,
        Columns:     []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 33,
            NameEnd: 36,
            Name:    "bar",
          },
        },
        ReferenceTable: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 49,
          NameEnd: 51,
          Name:    "t2",
        },
        ReferenceColumns: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 53,
            NameEnd: 59,
            Name:    "t2key1",
          },
        },
        OnDelete: "",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo ADD FOREIGN KEY (bar) REFERENCES t2 (t2key1)
